page.title: 18FAMILY LIFE
page.content: I used to live in London and when my job moved to Ashford my family and I bought a house in Tenterden because it is a nice quiet place to live and there is no trouble on the streets. I am pleased we moved out of London and my children can grow up in the country away from the drugs and gangs of layabouts. There are good schools in Tenterden and it is safe for the children to go out on their own. It is a really clean place with flowers and trees everywhere. At Christmas there are fairy lights in the trees along the High Street, all the shops are decorated and the church tower is floodlit. It looks just like a Christmas card. In the winter we tend to stay at home and watch a video and maybe have a Chinese or Indian take-away. In the summer we go out in the car to the seaside.
